full_text: Vaccines developed in China and Russia may have an important role to play in the fight against covid-19. But a lack of transparency over trial data could erode trust in vaccines https://t.co/1OipbJQg0j

localize.full_text: 中国和俄罗斯研发的疫苗可能在对抗covid-19的过程中发挥重要作用。但试验数据缺乏透明度可能会削弱对疫苗的信任https://t.co/1OipbJQg0j。
中國和俄羅斯研發的疫苗可能在對抗covid-19的過程中發揮重要作用。但試驗數據缺乏透明度可能會削弱對疫苗的信任https://t.co/1OipbJQg0j。
